data.text: One of the quickest services we have ever experienced, the staff was very cooperative and willing to help. The breakfast buffet was delicious and spectacular, the food was fresh and kept on being renewed the moment it would run out. We enjoyed our stay to the max.
data.title: amazing stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

 
Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at Golden Tulip Media Hotel. Delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and you found our staff, service and facilities to your satisfaction and thank you for giving us a perfect score. 

We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit. 

Kind regards,

 Issam Slaimi - General Manager
owner_response.author: Issam Slaimi

data.text:
Nothing much to complain about, nor to praise.
It's ok for a couple of nights, it's clean, it has a small pool that will entertain your child once in a while, a small gym and a steam room, a metro station is 10 minutes away, wi-fi is decent and they offer free transfers to JBR beach and some malls. We never used it.
On the minus side, the rooms are dated. Breakfast is the same every day. No slippers in the room. We asked for and never received them. We were 3 guests and only got 2 bath towels and one hand towel. We asked for more they provided but the next day we only got 2 clean ones.
We tried the buffet dinner once and weren't impressed by the taste.
There's nothing you can do in the proximity, so you'll always have to grab a taxi or use the crowded metro to get somewhere.
data.title: Ok for a short stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear  Ciprian,

Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay in our hotel. Please accept my sincerest apologies for the inconvenience. Guest feedback such as yours helps us identify areas where we can improve on our guest experience. Rest assured that corrective measures will be put in place.

We hope to be of service to you again.

Kind regards, 

Issam Slaimi - General Manager
owner_response.author: Issam Slaimi

data.text: The hotel is amazing, and the people are incredibly nice. I felt familiar from the first moment, everyone was smiling and seemed very friendly and welcoming. The hotel also takes into account all the details of the guest, and works to satisfy you in various ways. I liked the communication between the hotel management and the guests. After my arrival, I received a message to communicate via the WhatsApp application as an additional means of communication from inside or outside the hotel. Thank you from the bottom of my heart. ♥️
data.title: My best experience in Dubai ever.

data.text: I really enjoyed the hotel, everything was perfect. The rooms and the bathroom were very clean and equipped with everything that you might need. The staff were very friendly, hard working, polite. Food was great, no complaints at all. I would like to visit the hotel again. ❤️
data.title: Great hotel!

data.text: We had a good time at Golden Tulupi.the customer service was something else .The staff are hard working.Best services were from Tirtha and Porja  I like a very much hotel and hotel staf do definitely I well be come back thanks Mr Tirtha for ur help
data.title: Customer service   was great
